original_text: And immediately the man was made whole, and took up his bed, and walked: and on the same day was the sabbath.
korean_text: 그 사람이 곧 나아서 자리를 들고 걸어가니라

sentences.original_text: And immediately the man was made whole,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 사람은 즉시 온전하게 되었고,

sentences.original_text: and on the same day was the sabbath.
